import logging

version = ‘0.4.0’

class DistlibException(Exception): pass

try: from logging import NullHandler except ImportError: # pragma: no cover

class NullHandler(logging.Handler):

    def handle(self, record):
        pass

    def emit(self, record):
        pass

    def createLock(self):
        self.lock = None

logger = logging.getLogger(name) logger.addHandler(NullHandler())
